Random Recipe Generator for iPhone

Use the Random Recipe Generator for iPhone to conjure up deliciously stupid recipes wherever you are!

The full (paid) version</a> allows customisation of the ingredient list, so you can delete that pesky thing you don't like (so long, cucumbers!) and add anything you have hiding in your kitchen cupboards and have the recipe you always dreamed of! If it's not silly enough, turn on Insane Mode to unleash your inner ... er, crazy chef.

The Free</a> version doesn't allow customisation of the ingredients list and is also missing some of the recipe/insane content, so give it a whirl and then decide you want to upgrade to the full version!

Here's some exciting screenshots:

<img src="http://jamesoff.net/site/wp-content/uploads/2010/04/IMG_0375.PNG" alt="Recipe View" title="IMG_0375" width="320" height="480" class="size-full wp-image-404" /> <img src="http://jamesoff.net/site/wp-content/uploads/2010/04/IMG_0376.PNG" alt="Ingredients view" title="IMG_0376" width="320" height="480" class="size-full wp-image-405" /> <img src="http://jamesoff.net/site/wp-content/uploads/2010/04/IMG_0377.PNG" alt="Editing an ingredient" title="IMG_0377" width="320" height="480" class="size-full wp-image-406" />

Go grab it from the App Store</a> now!</strong> :)

If you need support for the app, there's an app</strike> page</a> for that.
